member.name: T:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToConsole
member.summary: Writes log events to the diagnostic trace.
member.remarks: GoF Design Pattern: Observer. The Observer Design Pattern allows this class to attach itself to an the logger and 'listen' to certain events and be notified of the event.

member.name: M:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToConsole.Log(System.Object,Dev.Log.LogEventArgs)
member.summary: Writes a log request to the diagnostic trace on the page.

member.name: T:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToDatabase
member.summary: Writes log events to a database.
member.remarks: GoF Design Pattern: Observer. The Observer Design Pattern allows this class to attach itself to an the logger and 'listen' to certain events and be notified of the event.

member.name: M:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToDatabase.Log(System.Object,Dev.Log.LogEventArgs)
member.summary: Writes a log request to the database.
member.remarks: Actual database insert statements are commented out. You can activate this if you have the proper database configuration and access privileges.

member.name: T:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToEmail
member.remarks: GoF Design Pattern: Observer. The Observer Design Pattern allows this class to attach itself to an the logger and 'listen' to certain events and be notified of the event.

member.name: M:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToEmail.Log(System.Object,Dev.Log.LogEventArgs)
member.summary: Sends a log request via email.
member.remarks: Actual email 'Send' calls are commented out. Uncomment if you have the proper email privileges.

member.name: T:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToEventlog
member.summary: Writes log events to the Windows event log.
member.remarks: GoF Design Pattern: Observer. The Observer Design Pattern allows this class to attach itself to an the logger and 'listen' to certain events and be notified of the event.

member.name: M:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToEventlog.Log(System.Object,Dev.Log.LogEventArgs)
member.summary: Write a log request to the event log.
member.remarks: Actual event log write entry statements are commented out. Uncomment if you have the proper privileges.

member.name: T:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToFile
member.summary: Writes log events to a local file.
member.remarks: GoF Design Pattern: Observer. The Observer Design Pattern allows this class to attach itself to an the logger and 'listen' to certain events and be notified of the event.

member.name: M:Dev.Log.Impl.ObserverLogToFile.Log(System.Object,Dev.Log.LogEventArgs)
member.summary: Write a log request to a file.
